channel.title: Okta expression language :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta expression language Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: At the moment, there are two documents. The main one covers the “legacy” Okta expression language and the secondary one covers it in Identity Engine. Suggest that these documents are role-reversed so that the main doc covers all the support for IDX and the secondary doc covers the diffs between it and Classic Engine. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer
